head.title: Contractor - New page
design: #content,#footer,#header p,#content p,#footer p, #header *[data-module=text],            #content *[data-module=text],            #footer *[data-module=text],            *[data-module=text_number]            { font-family: 'Asap', sans-serif!important; /* asap */}

*[data-module=title],            #header h1, #header h2, #header h3, #header h4, #header h5, #header h6,            #content h1, #content h2, #content h3, #content h4, #content h5, #content h6,            #footer h1, #footer h2, #footer h3, #footer h4, #footer h5, #footer h6            { font-family:'Flamenco', cursive!important; /* flamenco */ }
#content a, #content * a, #content p a, #footer a, #footer p a  { color:#614276; /* #614276 */ }
#header .navbar-brand {font-family:'Crimson Text', serif; /* crimsonText */ }
#header .navbar-brand {font-size:32px; } /* 32 */
#header .navbar-brand {color:#614276; } /* #614276 */
#header *[data-module=navbar] ul.nav li a,  #header *[data-module=navbar] .root:hover > ul.dropdown-menu li a  { font-family:'Montserrat', serif; /* montserrat */ }
#header *[data-module=navbar] ul.nav li a, #header *[data-module=navbar] .root:hover > ul.dropdown-menu li a { font-size:16px; /* 16 */ }

#header *[data-module=navbar] ul.nav li a, #header *[data-module=navbar] button.navbar-toggle:before,  #header *[data-module=navbar] .root:hover > ul.dropdown-menu li a { color:#614276; /* #614276 */ }
body,#content,#content p, *[data-module=text], #content *[data-module=text], div div *[data-module="text"] ul[class] li::before { color:#000000; /* #000000 */}
.bm-rm-item i, *[data-module=title],#content h1,#content h2,#content h3,#content h4,#content h5,#content h6 { color:#000000; /* #000000  */ }
#content,#footer,#header p,#content p,#footer p, #header *[data-module=text], #content *[data-module=text], #footer *[data-module=text] { font-size:18px; /* 18  */ }
#footer, #footer p, #footer *[data-module=text], #footer *[data-module=title] { color:#ffffff; /* #ffffff */}

/* #614276 */ .bm-focus-previews .btn-default,#header .btn-deafult, #content .btn-default, #footer .btn-default,#content .progress-bar, #footer .progress-bar, *[data-module=countdown_timer] .countdown_timer .bm-countdown-part, *[data-module=countdown_timer] .countdown_timer .bm-countdown-label, #header .bm-social-module.bm-social-theme li:not(.bm-social-instagram), #content .bm-social-module.bm-social-theme li:not(.bm-social-instagram), #footer .bm-social-module.bm-social-theme li:not(.bm-social-instagram), #content .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme li[class], #footer .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme li[class], .bm-focus-previews .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme li[class], .bm-focus-previews .progress-bar, body div .bm-ch-butc-bg,body div .bm-ch-butc-hbg:hover { background-color:#614276; border-color: #463055; } *[data-module=countdown_timer] .countdown_timer.bm-countdown-scoreboard .bm-countdown-part, *[data-module=countdown_timer] .countdown_timer .lines{ background-color:rgba(97,66,118,0.5);} body div .bm-ch-butc-borc,html #header .btn-bordered:hover, html #content .btn-bordered:hover, html #footer .btn-bordered:hover, html .bm-focus-previews .btn-bordered:hover, #content .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme.bm-social-tcircled li[class], #footer .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme.bm-social-tcircled li[class], .bm-focus-previews .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme.bm-social-tcircled li[class] { border-color: #463055; } html #header .btn-bordered, html #content .btn-bordered, html #footer .btn-bordered, html .bm-focus-previews .btn-bordered{ border-color: #614276; color: #614276; } #header .bm-social-module.bm-social-theme li.bm-social-instagram, #content .bm-social-module.bm-social-theme li.bm-social-instagram, #footer .bm-social-module.bm-social-theme li.bm-social-instagram { background: #614276; border-color: #463055; } #content .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme.bm-social-tcircled li a:after, #footer .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme.bm-social-tcircled li a:after, .bm-focus-previews .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme.bm-social-tcircled li a:after { color: #463055; } *[data-module=progress_bar] fieldset.rating label.active, *[data-module=quote] .bm-quote-module-quotes:after, *[data-module=quote] .bm-quote-module-quotes:before, body *[data-module=progress_bar] .bm-stars .active, .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme.bm-social-shapeless li a:after, .bm-focus-previews .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme.bm-social-shapeless li a:after, *[data-module=text_number],body #content .bm-ch-butc-tc[data-module=title],body #footer .bm-ch-butc-tc[data-module=title],body #content .bm-ch-butc-tc *[data-module=title],body #footer .bm-ch-butc-tc *[data-module=title],body #content .bm-ch-butc-tc[data-module=text],body #footer .bm-ch-butc-tc[data-module=text],body #content .bm-ch-butc-tc *[data-module=text],body #footer .bm-ch-butc-tc *[data-module=text],body .bm-focus-previews .bm-ch-butc-tc *[data-module=title], body .bm-focus-previews .bm-ch-butc-tc *[data-module=text], body .bm-focus-previews .bm-ch-butc-tc[data-module=title], body .bm-focus-previews .bm-ch-butc-tc[data-module=text], .bm-ch-butc-tc{color:#614276;} *[data-module=progress_bar] svg.bm-circle-bar text, *[data-module=progress_bar] text {fill:#614276; }[data-module=countdown_timer] svg.bm-circle-bar .animated, svg.bm-circle-bar .animated {stroke: #614276;} div hr[data-module=breaker], div hr[data-module=breaker].bm-breaker-module-medium, div hr[data-module=breaker].bm-breaker-module-large {border-top-color: #614276 }.bm-ch-bc-bxs{box-shadow: -20px 20px #614276 ;}

#header .btn-deafult:hover, #content .btn-default:hover, #footer .btn-default:hover, .bm-focus-previews .btn-default:hover,#header .bm-social-module.bm-social-theme li:hover, #content .bm-social-module.bm-social-theme li:hover, #footer .bm-social-module.bm-social-theme li:hover, body div .bm-ch-buth-bg,{ background-color:#463055; /* #463055 */ }

#header .btn-deafult, #content .btn-default, #footer .btn-default, .bm-focus-previews .btn-default,*[data-module=countdown_timer] .countdown_timer .bm-countdown-part, *[data-module=countdown_timer] .countdown_timer .bm-countdown-label, .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme li a:after, .bm-focus-previews .bm-social-module-new.bm-social-theme li a:after { color:#ffffff; /* #ffffff */ } body div .bm-ch-butt-bg{ background-color: #ffffff; }
.bm-brand-background-color .container .navbar-header {background-color:#ffffff; } /* #ffffff */
#footer{ background-color: #614276; }
.is-fonts-advanced {} /* 0 */
.font-pairing {} /* 4 */

*[data-module=icon] { color:#614276; /* #614276 */ border-color: #614276; } .bm-bordered-vertical .bm-col { border-color: #614276; }#content .bm-ch-ic-htc:hover *[data-module=text], #content .bm-ch-ic-htc:hover *[data-module=title], #content .bm-ch-ic-htc:hover label, #content .bm-ch-ic-htc:hover p, #footer .bm-ch-ic-htc:hover *[data-module=text], #footer .bm-ch-ic-htc:hover *[data-module=title], #footer .bm-ch-ic-htc:hover label, #footer .bm-ch-ic-htc:hover p { color:#614276;}

#content *[data-bg-brightness] .info_popup *[data-module=title],  #header *[data-bg-brightness] .info_popup *[data-module=title],  #footer *[data-bg-brightness] .info_popup *[data-module=title], #content *[data-bg-brightness^="-"] .info_popup *[data-module=title],  #header *[data-bg-brightness^="-"] .info_popup *[data-module=title],  #footer *[data-bg-brightness^="-"] .info_popup *[data-module=title] { color:#000000; /* #000000 */}
*[data-bg-brightness] .info_popup *[data-module=icon], *[data-bg-brightness^="-"] .info_popup *[data-module=icon]  { color:#614276; /* #614276 */}

#content div.bm-ch-stc-c *[data-module=title],#header div.bm-ch-stc-c *[data-module=title],#footer div.bm-ch-stc-c *[data-module=title],#header div.bm-ch-stc-c *[data-module=text],#content div.bm-ch-stc-c *[data-module=text],#footer div.bm-ch-stc-c *[data-module=text],#header div.bm-ch-stc-c p,#content div.bm-ch-stc-c p,#header div.bm-ch-stc-c p,#header div.bm-ch-stc-c label,#content div.bm-ch-stc-c label,#footer div.bm-ch-stc-c label,.bm-focus-previews div.bm-ch-stc-c *[data-module=title],.bm-focus-previews div.bm-ch-stc-c *[data-module=text],.bm-focus-previews div.bm-ch-stc-c p,.bm-focus-previews div.bm-ch-stc-c label,.bm-ch-stc,.bm-focus-previews div.bm-ch-stc{ color:#ffffff; /* #ffffff */}

/* menuHover */nav ul.dropdown-menu > li:hover > a:before, nav ul.navbar-nav > li:hover > a:before{border-bottom-color: /* $menuHover */#614276/**/;color: /* $menuHover */#614276/**/ !important;} nav ul.dropdown-menu > li.active > a, nav ul.navbar-nav > li.active > a{color: /* $menuHover */#614276/**/ !important;} nav ul.dropdown-menu{border-top-color: /* $menuHover */#614276/**/ !important;} nav ul.dropdown-menu li a:hover{color: /* $menuHover */#614276/**/ !important;}
